Rulings.Base: 1. If you have zero or 1 Spell Cards in your GY, you cannot activate "Hidden Spellbook".\n2. When you activate "Hidden Spellbook" and your opponent chains "Disappear" or "Graverobber", and 1 of the targeted Spell Cards is removed from play, the remaining Spell Card goes back to the Deck and the Deck is shuffled.
